column1: Local Foods////I've come many times and tried multiple things on the menu
column2: from their sandwiches to their salads
column3: and everything's tasted great! As a huge fan of salmon
column4: I especially love their smoked salmon sandwich. It was the first thing I tried since visiting Local Foods and still remains my favorite
column5: but at the end of the day
column6: it's really hard to go wrong with any choice here.
